title: Carnegie Hall: The story of a dream come true
description: In a world devastated by a nuclear war, a young guy puts all his efforts in rebuilding the Carnegie Hall in New York, wanting it to be an example of accepting art instead of violence. An entrepreneur is now willing to help him with his business, after an accident : is he really willing to help, or does he have any ties with the mob? A book discussing about the relationship between music and violence, a critic to current society, and a hope for a better world.
author: D. Bagnato
